summary: While attending a school for diplomats' daughters, the teen-aged daughter of the American ambassador uses her access to various embassies to engage in espionage.
cast: Murray Hamilton|Joyce Taylor|Hugh Marlowe|Khigh Dhiegh|Charlie Briggs|Norma Varden|Garth Benton|María Cristina Servera|Janet Mary Prance|Penny Anne Mills|Alexandra Bastedo|Ariane Glaser|Ilona Schütze|Anna Baj|Aiko Sakamoto|Gina Trikonis|Judy Pace|Luz Gloria Hervias|Marie-Louise Bielke|Ignacia Farias Luque|Kathy Dunn|Lynne Sue Moon|John Alvar|Jimmy Dime|George Nardelli|Dorothy Neumann|Walter Rode|Emil Sitka
title: 13 Chicas aterrorizadas
